Metadata.title: Packbrand Solutions | Custom Branded Packaging
Metadata.description: Premium custom-branded packaging for businesses. Cups, bags, boxes, food containers, napkins, and labels with your logo. Serving the entire United States. Bilingual service in English and Spanish.
Metadata.ogDescription: Premium custom-branded packaging for businesses. We dress brands for success.

Footer.tagline: We Dress Brands for Success. Premium custom-branded packaging for restaurants, food trucks, and food & beverage brands across the United States.

Home.heroDescription: Premium custom-branded packaging for restaurants, food trucks, and food & beverage brands. Your logo. Your colors. Your identity.
Home.lowMinDesc: No massive commitments required. We offer some of the lowest minimum orders in the industry.
Home.trustedBySubtitle: Brands served across the United States
Home.cupsCategoryDesc: Branded paper & plastic cups for hot and cold beverages.
Home.bagsCategoryDesc: Paper bags with your logo for takeout & retail.
Home.boxesCategoryDesc: Custom boxes for food delivery & gift packaging.
Home.containersCategoryDesc: Bowls, trays, and containers with your branding.
Home.labelsCategoryDesc: Custom stickers and labels for any product.
Home.whyLowMinimumsDesc: Start small. We offer the lowest minimums in the industry.
Home.whyFastDeliveryDesc: Quick turnaround times so you never run out of stock.
Home.whyBilingualDesc: Full service in English and Spanish. We speak your language.
Home.ctaDescription: Get a free quote today. We’ll design your custom packaging and deliver it fast. Call, email, or WhatsApp us — we’re here for you.
Home.storyText2: We changed that. Today we serve hundreds of businesses across the United States, offering premium custom cups, bags, boxes, food containers, and labels with low minimum orders, and bilingual support.
Home.solutionsHeroDesc: From branded packaging to AI-powered ordering — Packbrand Solutions is the all-in-one growth partner for restaurants and food brands.
Home.packagesDesc: Premium custom-branded cups, bags, boxes, food containers, and labels with low minimums and fast delivery.
Home.directDesc: In partnership with Talos — a complete white-label restaurant platform for online ordering, POS, and loyalty.
Home.voiceDesc: AI-powered voice agent that handles phone orders 24/7. Never miss a call, reduce labor costs, delight customers.
Home.growthDesc: Full-service digital marketing — Meta Ads, Instagram, and beyond. Attract new customers and keep them coming back.
Home.solutionsCtaDesc: Talk to our team and find the right Packbrand solution for you.

About.heroTitle: Dressing Brands for Success Since Day One
About.heroDescription: We started Packbrand Solutions with one mission: give small businesses access to the same premium custom packaging that big brands use. Bilingual, fast, and affordable.
About.storyText1: Packbrand Solutions was founded by entrepreneurs who understood the struggle: small restaurants, food trucks, and emerging brands deserved packaging that looked as good as their food tasted — but the big packaging companies only wanted to work with big brands.
About.storyText2: We changed that. Today we serve hundreds of businesses across the United States, offering premium custom cups, bags, boxes, food containers, and labels with low minimum orders, and bilingual support.
About.missionTitle: Your Logo. Your Brand. Your Identity.
About.missionText: Every cup, bag, and box we produce is a marketing opportunity for your business. We make sure your brand is front and center — from the first order to the thousandth.
About.ctaDescription: Join hundreds of brands who trust Packbrand Solutions for their custom packaging. Let’s build your brand.

Contact.title: Get a Free Quote
Contact.subtitle: Fill out the form and we’ll get back to you within 24 hours with a custom quote for your packaging needs.
Contact.messagePlaceholder: Tell us about your project, timeline, and any special requirements...
Contact.successMessage: Thanks! We’ll review your request and get back to you within 24 hours.
Contact.infoSubtitle: Prefer to reach out directly? We’re available by phone, email, or WhatsApp — in English and Spanish.
